tool_description: An API showing all the latest climate change news around the world.

api_list.name: Get Specific Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns specific news about climate change from the Guardian newspaper.

required_parameters.name: newspaperId
required_parameters.description: The identifier for the newspaper from which to fetch news.

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all news about climate change from various sources worldwide.
